lead_paragraph: A Houston man accused of fatally shooting a sheriff’s deputy last summer has been ruled mentally incompetent to stand trial for capital murder.

headline.print_headline: Texas: Suspect in Deputy’s Killing Is Ruled Incompetent
headline.main: Texas: Suspect in Deputy’s Killing Is Ruled Incompetent

snippet: A Houston man accused of fatally shooting a sheriff’s deputy last summer has been ruled mentally incompetent to stand trial for capital murder.
abstract: Judge Susan Brown of State District Court in Houston commits Shannon Miles to mental hospital after he was deemed mentally incompetent to stand trial for capital murder; Miles fatally shot Harris County, Tex, Deputy Darren Goforth at gas station in 2015.
